miniapp.name: TX Battle Royale
miniapp.subtitle: Predict BTC transactions and win
miniapp.description: Real-time Bitcoin block transaction prediction game. Guess the number of transactions in the next block and compete with other players for glory!
miniapp.ogTitle: TX Battle Royale - Bitcoin Prediction Game
miniapp.ogDescription: Join the ultimate Bitcoin transaction prediction battle! Guess block transactions and win against other players in real-time.
